ui_browse_no_service_body_use_backup: Wallpaper Engine will now try to show an emergency backup until the company of STEAM (VALVE) has sorted out their issues.
ui_browse_steam_offline_notice: STEAM Workshop servers are OFFLINE. You are browsing an emergency backup from {{date}}. Please wait a few hours for the company of STEAM (VALVE) to fix the STEAM Workshop servers again.
ui_browse_details_properties_reset_promp: Do you want to reset the current properties back to their defaults?
ui_browse_details_properties_preset_hint:
A Workshop preset includes all of your custom wallpaper settings and any images or videos you may have imported into the wallpaper.

You can publish them on the Steam Workshop just like regular wallpapers, allowing other users to experience the look and feel with the settings you have created. You can also download presets which other users have shared.
ui_browse_details_properties_apply_to_al: Apply to all Wallpapers and set Default Values
Set the default values for all wallpapers to the current ones and optionally reset all existing wallpapers to these values.
ui_browse_modal_remove_preset_info: The following presets are depending on the wallpaper(s) you are trying to unsubscribe and will be removed as well: {{presets}}
ui_browse_modal_subscribe_preset_body:
The wallpaper {{title}} is a preset for another wallpaper which you need to subscribe to as well to use it.

Subscribe to both now?
ui_browse_preset_modal_save_description: If a preset with the same name exists already, it will be overwritten.
ui_browse_preset_modal_empty: You have not created any presets for this wallpaper yet.
ui_settings_hotkeys_example:
Hotkeys must contain Ctrl, Shift, Alt. Examples:

Shift + Ctrl + B
Shift + F1

A red border means that your hotkey is not valid.
